mapper.select:
select f_tinyint as fTinyint, f_smallint as fSmallint, f_mediumint as fMediumint, f_int as fInt, f_integer as fInteger, f_bigint as fBigint, f_double as fDouble, f_float as fFloat, f_decimal as fDecimal, f_numeric as fNumeric, f_char as fChar, f_varchar as fVarchar, f_year as fYear, f_tinytext as fTinytext, f_text as fText, f_longtext as fLongtext, isDet as isDet from a
${sqlWhere}
mapper.insert:
insert into a
f_smallint, f_mediumint, f_int, f_integer, f_bigint, f_double, f_float, f_decimal, f_numeric, f_char, f_varchar, f_year, f_tinytext, f_text, f_longtext, isDet,
values
#{fSmallint}, #{fMediumint}, #{fInt}, #{fInteger}, #{fBigint}, #{fDouble}, #{fFloat}, #{fDecimal}, #{fNumeric}, #{fChar}, #{fVarchar}, #{fYear}, #{fTinytext}, #{fText}, #{fLongtext}, #{isDet},
